Deddy Mizwar Bakal Pindah ke Partai Gelora Besutan Fahri Hamzah
07 Nov 2019, 00:40 by Dewi Nurita, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Politikus Partai Demokrat Deddy Mizwar disebut akan loncat pagar dan bergabung dengan Partai Gelora Indonesia besutan Anis Matta dan Fahri Hamzah.
"Ya, Insya Allah," ujar Mahfudz Siddiq, salah satu pendiri Partai Gelora, saat dikonfirmasi ihwal kabar Deddy Mizwar akan bergabung ke partainya, pada Rabu malam, 6 November 2019.
Partai Gelora memang belum dideklarasikan secara resmi. Tepat pada Hari Pahlawan 10 November nanti, akan diadakan acara silaturahmi nasional penggagas Gelora Indonesia. Pada acara itu, ujar Mahfudz, akan tampak wajah-wajah calon pengurus dan kader Partai Gelora Indonesia. "Tunggu saja nanti," ujar dia.
Ketua DPP Demokrat, Jansen Sitindaon mengatakan, sampai saat ini DPP belum menerima surat pengunduran diri dari Deddy Mizwar sebagai kader Demokrat. Deddy juga masih berstatus sebagai pengurus DPD Jabar.
Kendati demikian, ujar Jansen, Demokrat menghargai hak politik setiap orang, jika memang ingin pindah partai. "Kami hargai dan hormati, memang realitas politik di Indonesia hari ini kan, gampang sekali orang pindah-pindah partai dengan motif dan tujuannya masing-masing," ujar Jansen saat dihubungi terpisah.
Jika benar ingin pindah partai, ujar Jansen, dirinya akan tetap berhubungan baik dengan Deddy. "Kami tentu mendoakan yang terbaik, semoga Bang Demiz nyaman dan tenteram bersama keluarga barunya di Partai Gelora," ujar Jansen.

Deddy Mizwar Will Move to the Fahora Hamzah Gelora Party
Nov 7 2019, 00:40 by Dewi Nurita, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Democratic Party politician Deddy Mizwar is said to be jumping the fence and joining the Indonesian Gelora Party made by Anis Matta and Fahri Hamzah.
"Yes, God willing," said Mahfudz Siddiq, one of the founders of the Gelora Party, when it was confirmed that Deddy Mizwar would join his party on Wednesday night, November 6, 2019.
The Gelora Party has indeed not been officially declared. Right on Heroes' Day on November 10th, there will be a national gathering of initiators Gelora Indonesia. At the event, said Mahfudz, the faces of prospective administrators and cadres of the Indonesian Gelora Party would be seen. "Just wait," he said.
Chairman of the Democratic DPP, Jansen Sitindaon said, to date the DPP has not received a resignation letter from Deddy Mizwar as a Democratic cadre. Deddy is also still a member of the board of West Java DPD.
Nevertheless, said Jansen, Democrats respect everyone's political rights, if they really want to move parties. "We respect and respect, indeed the political reality in Indonesia today, it's easy for people to move around the party with their own motives and goals," Jansen said when contacted separately.
If he really wants to move the party, said Jansen, he will keep on good terms with Deddy. "We certainly pray for the best, hopefully Bang Demiz is comfortable and at ease with his new family in the Gelora Party," Jansen said.
